document.docAuthor: Araújo, Marcel Santos De & Feres, Reinaldo José Fazzio
document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the mite (Acari) type specimens deposited at the “ Universidade Estadual Paulista (UNESP), Campus de São José do Rio Preto ”, São Paulo, Brazil (DZSJRP)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the mite (Acari) type specimens deposited at the “ Universidade Estadual Paulista (UNESP), Campus de São José do Rio Preto ”, São Paulo, Brazil (DZSJRP)

subSubSection.paragraph:
20)
Typhlodromips corniformis Moraes, Barbosa & Castro, 2013

(
Moraes et al . 2013: 330
, figs 36–40)

Paratypes (9208–9209):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Cananéia, from
Vernonia scorpioides (Lam.)
( Asteraceae ), 12.XII.2002 , coll. L.V.F. Silva; 1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Pariquera-Açu, from
Eupatorium
sp., 20.VII.2001 , coll. L.V.F. Silva.

21)
Typhlodromips furcus Lofego, Demite & Feres, 2011

(
Lofego et al . 2011b: 110
, figs 1–7)

Holotype (8656):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Palestina , 20°17’S 49°03’W , from
Lithraea molleoides (Vell.) Engl.
( Anacardiaceae ),
18. VI .2009
, coll. P.R. Demite and A.C. Lofego.

Paratypes (8657–8669):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 1 ♀ ; 3 ♀ , 4 ♂ ,
24. VI .2009
; 1 ♀ , from
Cecropia pachystachia Trec.
( Urticaceae ),
5. VI .2008
; 1 ♀ , 1 ♂ , Brazil , São Paulo , Barretos, 20°29”S 48°49’W , from
Caryocar brasiliensis Camb.
( Caryocaraceae ), 15.IX.2008 ; 1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Novo Horizonte, 21°03’S 49°18’W , from
Trichillia casaretti
D. DC. ( Meliaceae ),
26. VII .2007
; 1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , São João de Iracema, 20°28’S 50°17’W , from
Cecropia pachystachya Trécul
( Urticaceae ), 26.IX.2007 ; 1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Nova Granada , 20°32’S 49°14’W , from
Cecropia pachystachya Trécul
( Urticaceae ),
8. IX .2008
.

22)
Typhlodromips igapo Nuvoloni, Lofego, Rezende & Feres, 2014

(
Nuvoloni et al . 2014: 18
, figs 39–43)

Holotype (9535):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Amazonas, 10 km away from Manaus, Igapó Forest fragment, from
Hevea microphylla Ule
( Euphorbiaceae ), 10.VIII.2012 , coll. F.M. Nuvoloni.

Paratypes (9536–9539):
3 ♀ , same data as holotype ; 2 ♀ , Brazil , Acre , Rio Branco, experimental area from “ UFAC ”, from
Hevea brasiliensis Muell. Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ), 20.VIII.2012 , same collector; 2 ♀ , Brazil , Acre , Rio Branco, “Fazenda Experimental Catuaba”, from
Hirtella pauciflora Little
( Chrysobalanaceae ), 20.VIII.2012 ; same collector.

23)
Typhlodromips japi Lofego, Demite & Feres, 2011

(
Lofego et al . 2011b: 112
, figs 8–14)

Holotype (8670):
1 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Jundiaí, Serra do Japi, 23°11’S 46°52’W , from
Croton floribundus Spreng.
( Euphorbiaceae ),
4. VI .2008
, colls. V.O. Lima and C. Vieira.

Paratypes (8671–8677):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 1 ♀ , 1 ♂ ; 1 ♀ ,
29.VIII.2008
; 4 ♀ , 2 ♂ , from
Dicksonia sellowiana Hook.
( Dicksoniaceae ),
29.VIII.2007
, colls. P.R. Demite and A.C. Lofego ; 1 ♀ , from
Heliconia
sp. ( Heliconiaceae ),
30.VIII.2007
, colls. J.C. de Souza and A.C. Lofego
.

24)
Typhlodromips paramilus Nuvoloni, Lofego, Castro & Feres, 2015

(
Nuvoloni et al . 2015: 267
, figs 8–16)

Holotype (10171):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Bahia , Igrapiúna, 13°48’S , 39°10’W , from
Hevea brasiliensis Muell. Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ), clone PMB 01, 8.VIII.2008 , coll. E.B. Castro.

Paratypes (9962–9963, 10172–10174):
same data of holotyp with exceptions, 1 ♂ ; 3 ♀ , from
Hevea brasiliensis Muell. Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ), clone FDR 5788, 8.VIII.2008 , coll. E.B. Castro; 1 ♀ , from
Hevea brasiliensis Muell. Arg.
( Euphorbiaceae ), clone PMB 01, 8.VIII.2008 , coll. F.M. Nuvoloni.

25)
Typhlodromips robustisetus Moraes, Barbosa & Castro, 2013

(
Moraes et al . 2013: 331
, figs 41–45)

Paratypes (9204–9205):
3 ♀ , Brazil , São Paulo , Cananéia, from
Piptocarpha
sp. ( Asteraceae ), 9.X.2001 , coll. L.V.F. Silva.
